website_summaries.verdict: The 13.3-inch Lenovo Yoga 730 doesn't change much from last year, but what Lenovo added definitely improves the package to keep it one of the best thin-and-light two-in-ones you can buy.
pros: The thinner, lighter 13.3-inch Lenovo Yoga 730 two-in-one improves on last year's model with faster 8th-gen Intel Core i-series processors
and -- eventually -- support for Amazon Alexa
cons: Battery life is good, but not great for the category and is the only area where performance is not better than its predecessor in our tests
USB type-C adapters are needed for Ethernet or HDMI output, and there's no SD card slot
